PerfectNetExp.abs: Winnie_新浪博客 ... desicrated 亵渎 rededication 献身 enunciate 阐述.
"重献一生(rededication)" 对你失丧的状况无济于事。有人说，他们如「浪子」一样回头了。

list.abs: They were asked to rededicate themselves to their country ., 他们不得已为了国家再次献身.

sentences.sentence: "the rededication of the Temple of Jerusalem"

auth_sentence.content: The word Hanukkah means rededication and commemorates the Jews' struggle for religious freedom.
